response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (20-year-old male)", "high", "Young age is associated with higher impulsivity and risk-taking behaviors, which can contribute to recidivism."],
    ["Race (Identifies as Black)", "medium", "Statistical disparities and potential systemic biases can affect outcomes, although race itself is not a direct cause."],
    ["Criminal History (1 arrest and conviction)", "medium", "A prior arrest and conviction indicate a history of criminal behavior, increasing the risk for future offenses."],
    ["Marital and Living Status (Never married, living alone)", "medium", "Lack of stable family support can lead to social isolation and reduced accountability."],
    ["Education (High school diploma, not enrolled in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment may restrict employment opportunities and increase potential for recidivism."],
    ["Employment History (Held 3 jobs during the year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes may indicate instability, impacting reintegration and increasing risk."],
    ["Substance Use (No drug use in past four years)", "low", "Absence of recent substance abuse reduces one common risk factor associated with recidivism."],
    ["Mental Health (Severe depressive symptoms in the past month)", "high", "Chronic depressive symptoms can impair judgment and social functioning, elevating the risk of recidivism."],
    ["Childhood Environment (Lived with non-biological adults, in a small rural household)", "medium", "Non-traditional early home environments may contribute to developmental instability, slightly increasing risk."],
    ["Religious Beliefs (Believes God influences personal fate)", "low", "A belief in divine influence can provide personal meaning and resilience, potentially mitigating recidivism risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 151 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and all of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with adults other than biological, foster or adoptive parents in a household of size 3, in a rural area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
